Interface PolicyMessageProperties

All Superinterfaces:
MessageProperties
public interface PolicyMessageProperties
extends MessageProperties

Class to define constants used by policy handler run time.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String EFFECTIVE_POLICY_CHOICES
          Name of the property used to retrieve a list of ChoiceIdentifiers.
static java.lang.String ENFORCE_POLICIES
          Name of the Boolean property indicating whether policies should be enforced (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
static java.lang.String IMPLEMENT_POLICIES
          Name of the Boolean property indicating whether policies should be implemented (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
